SQL.LOAD: SELECT ben_product_code_id, dealer_id, vendor_id, ben_product_code, description, currency_iso_code, price_uom, net_price, tax_type_xcd, durationinmonth, effective_date, expiration_date, vendor_billable_part_num, daystoexpireafterendday, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by FROM ELP_BEN_PRODUCT_CODE WHERE ben_product_code_id = :ben_product_code_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST:
select pc.ben_product_code_id, c.code || ' - ' || dealer_name dealer_name, pc.ben_product_code, pc.description, sc.description as vendor_name, pc.effective_date, pc.expiration_date, pc.vendor_billable_part_num
from elp_ben_product_code pc join elp_dealer edealer on (pc.dealer_id = edealer.dealer_id) join elp_company c on (c.company_id = edealer.company_id) join elp_service_center sc on (sc.service_center_id = pc.vendor_id) where 1 = 1 --dynamic_in_clause --dynamic_where_clause order by upper(dealer_name), upper(ben_product_code)
SQL.LOAD_BY_DEALER_PRODUCT: SELECT ben_product_code_id, dealer_id, vendor_id, ben_product_code, currency_iso_code, price_uom, net_price, tax_type_xcd, durationinmonth, effective_date, expiration_date, vendor_billable_part_num, daystoexpireafterendday, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by FROM ELP_BEN_PRODUCT_CODE WHERE dealer_id = :dealer_id AND product_code = :product_code
SQL.LOAD_BY_UNIQUE_KEY: SELECT ben_product_code_id, dealer_id, vendor_id, ben_product_code, currency_iso_code, price_uom, net_price, tax_type_xcd, durationinmonth, effective_date, expiration_date, vendor_billable_part_num, daystoexpireafterendday, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by FROM ELP_BEN_PRODUCT_CODE WHERE dealer_id = :dealer_id AND ben_product_code = :ben_product_code AND vendor_billable_part_num = :vendor_billable_part_num AND ben_product_code_id <> :ben_product_code_id
